definition: how much there is or how many there are of something that you can quantify, to develop into
details:
noun
- how much there is or how many there are of something that you can quantify
= synonyms: measure
- the relative magnitude of something with reference to a criterion
= example: the relative magnitude of something with reference to a criterion
- a quantity obtained by the addition of a group of numbers
= synonyms: total, sum
- a quantity of money
= synonyms: sum, sum of money, amount of money
verb
- to develop into
= example: to develop into
= synonyms: make, come, add up
- to add up in number or quantity
= example: to add up in number or quantity
= synonyms: total, number, come, add up
- to be tantamount or equivalent to
= example: to be tantamount or equivalent to
